name: Biventricular Non-Compaction Cardiomyopathy with Concomitant Ventricular Arrhythmias
chief_complaint: I keep having these episodes where my heart races and I feel like I'm going to pass out. I also get really short of breath even when I'm just sitting down.
treatment: heart failure management (diuretics, beta-blockers, ACE inhibitors)
prognosis: Guarded prognosis due to high risk of sudden cardiac death and progressive heart failure. Early intervention may improve outcomes.
description: A rare form of cardiomyopathy characterized by prominent ventricular trabeculations and deep intertrabecular recesses. The non-compacted myocardium predisposes to arrhythmias, thromboembolism, and progressive systolic dysfunction. Often presents with heart failure symptoms and ventricular arrhythmias.
multiple_choice: Biventricular Non-Compaction Cardiomyopathy with Concomitant Ventricular Arrhythmias
